entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 before morning. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 10:28 PM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
